verses.plain: Better is the poor that walketh in his integrity, than he that is perverse in his lips, and is a fool.

tokens.t: Better
the poor that walketh in his integrity, than
perverse in his lips, and is a fool.

verses.plain: Also, that the soul be without knowledge, it is not good; and he that hasteth with his feet sinneth.

tokens.t: Also,
the soul
without knowledge,
not good; and he that hasteth with
feet sinneth.

verses.plain: The foolishness of man perverteth his way: and his heart fretteth against the LORD.

tokens.t: The foolishness of man perverteth his way: and his heart fretteth against the

verses.plain: Wealth maketh many friends; but the poor is separated from his neighbour.

tokens.t: Wealth maketh many friends; but the poor is separated from his neighbour.

verses.plain: A false witness shall not be unpunished, and he that speaketh lies shall not escape.

tokens.t: A false witness shall not be unpunished, and
speaketh lies shall not escape.

verses.plain: Many will intreat the favour of the prince: and every man is a friend to him that giveth gifts.

tokens.t: Many will intreat the favour of the prince: and every man
a friend to him that giveth gifts.

verses.plain: All the brethren of the poor do hate him: how much more do his friends go far from him? he pursueth them with words, yet they are wanting to him.

tokens.t: All the brethren of the poor do hate him: how much more do his friends go far from him? he pursueth
words,
they
wanting

verses.plain: He that getteth wisdom loveth his own soul: he that keepeth understanding shall find good.

tokens.t: He that getteth wisdom loveth his own soul: he that keepeth understanding shall find good.

verses.plain: A false witness shall not be unpunished, and he that speaketh lies shall perish.

tokens.t: A false witness shall not be unpunished, and
speaketh lies shall perish.

verses.plain: Delight is not seemly for a fool; much less for a servant to have rule over princes.

tokens.t: Delight is not seemly for a fool; much less for a servant to have rule over princes.

verses.plain: The discretion of a man deferreth his anger; and it is his glory to pass over a transgression.

tokens.t: The discretion of a man deferreth his anger; and
his glory to pass over a transgression.

verses.plain: The king’s wrath is as the roaring of a lion; but his favour is as dew upon the grass.

tokens.t: The king’s wrath
as the roaring of a lion; but his favour
as dew upon the grass.

verses.plain: A foolish son is the calamity of his father: and the contentions of a wife are a continual dropping.

tokens.t: A foolish son
the calamity of his father: and the contentions of a wife
a continual dropping.

verses.plain: House and riches are the inheritance of fathers: and a prudent wife is from the LORD.

tokens.t: House and riches
the inheritance of fathers: and a prudent wife
from the

verses.plain: Slothfulness casteth into a deep sleep; and an idle soul shall suffer hunger.

tokens.t: Slothfulness casteth into a deep sleep; and an idle soul shall suffer hunger.

verses.plain: He that keepeth the commandment keepeth his own soul; but he that despiseth his ways shall die.

tokens.t: He that keepeth the commandment keepeth his own soul;
he that despiseth his ways shall die.

verses.plain: He that hath pity upon the poor lendeth unto the LORD; and that which he hath given will he pay him again.

tokens.t: He that hath pity upon the poor lendeth unto the
; and that which he hath given will he pay him again.

verses.plain: Chasten thy son while there is hope, and let not thy soul spare for his crying.

tokens.t: Chasten thy son while there is hope, and let not thy soul spare for his crying.

verses.plain: A man of great wrath shall suffer punishment: for if thou deliver him, yet thou must do it again.

tokens.t: A man of great wrath shall suffer punishment: for if thou deliver
, yet thou must do it again.

verses.plain: Hear counsel, and receive instruction, that thou mayest be wise in thy latter end.

tokens.t: Hear counsel, and receive instruction, that thou mayest be wise in thy latter end.

verses.plain: There are many devices in a man’s heart; nevertheless the counsel of the LORD, that shall stand.

tokens.t: many devices in a man’s heart; nevertheless the counsel of the
, that shall stand.

verses.plain: The desire of a man is his kindness: and a poor man is better than a liar.

tokens.t: The desire of a man
his kindness: and a poor man
better than a liar.

verses.plain: The fear of the LORD tendeth to life: and he that hath it shall abide satisfied; he shall not be visited with evil.

tokens.t: The fear of the
to life: and
shall abide satisfied; he shall not be visited with evil.

verses.plain: A slothful man hideth his hand in his bosom, and will not so much as bring it to his mouth again.

tokens.t: A slothful
hideth his hand in
bosom, and will not so much as bring it to his mouth again.

verses.plain: Smite a scorner, and the simple will beware: and reprove one that hath understanding, and he will understand knowledge.

tokens.t: Smite a scorner, and the simple will beware: and reprove one that hath understanding,
he will understand knowledge.

verses.plain: He that wasteth his father, and chaseth away his mother, is a son that causeth shame, and bringeth reproach.

tokens.t: He that wasteth
father,
chaseth away
mother,
a son that causeth shame, and bringeth reproach.

verses.plain: Cease, my son, to hear the instruction that causeth to err from the words of knowledge.

tokens.t: Cease, my son, to hear the instruction
to err from the words of knowledge.

verses.plain: An ungodly witness scorneth judgment: and the mouth of the wicked devoureth iniquity.

tokens.t: An ungodly witness scorneth judgment: and the mouth of the wicked devoureth iniquity.

verses.plain: Judgments are prepared for scorners, and stripes for the back of fools.

tokens.t: Judgments are prepared for scorners, and stripes for the back of fools.

footnotes.text: him…: Heb. a man of gifts
for…: or, to his destruction: or, to cause him to die
will beware: Heb. will be cunning
An…: Heb. A witness of Belial
